title: 915 24 "Destructive! One Shot, One Kill – Thunder Bagua!"Transliteration: "Hakai-teki! Ichigeki Hissatsu no Raimei Hakke!" (Japanese:破壊的！一撃必殺の雷鳴八卦！) Katsumi Tokoro Ryo Yamazaki Shigefumi Shingaki December 22, 2019(2019-12-22)
transformers_text: 915 24 Destructive One Shot One Kill Thunder B agua Transliteration Haka i tek i Ichi geki His s a tsu no Rai mei Hak ke Japanese Katsumi To koro Ryo Yamazaki S hig ef umi Shin gaki December 22 2019 2019 12 22 Luffy continues his furious battle with Kai do repeatedly attacking with Third Gear When Kai do reverts into his human form Luffy activates Fourth Gear Bounce man and unleashes a relentless barrage of blows But in the end Kai do is unaffected by Luffy's attacks and defeats him with a single swing of his kana b Law tries to save Luffy but his powers are nullified when Hawkins strikes him with a nail made of Sea stone revealing the substance originates from Wa no As Law is forced to flee by himself Kai do notes that even though unconscious Luffy continues to glare at him as the emperor scoffs at Luffy's aspirations at becoming King of the Pirates
tf_idf_text: destructive one shot one kill thunder agua transliteration haka tek ichi geki tsu rai mei hak japanese katsumi koro ryo yamazaki hig umi shin gaki december luffy continue furious battle kai repeatedly attack third gear kai reverts human form luffy activate fourth gear bounce man unleash relentless barrage blow end kai unaffected luffys attack defeat single swing kana law try save luffy power nullify hawkins strike nail make sea stone reveal substance originates law force flee kai note even though unconscious luffy continue glare emperor scoff luffys aspiration become king pirate
